title: Direct drill with fertiliser placement 3m
summary: Seed drill with fertiliser placement and a 3m drilling width.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a direct drill with fertiliser placement
eligible.eligibleBullet02: use either tines or discs to produce the seeding slot
eligible.eligibleBullet04: have no cultivation or seed bed preparation equipment in front of the seeding slot mechanism except where part of the fertiliser placement.
eligible.eligibleBullet05: place the seed in the seeding slot
eligible.eligibleBullet06: place the fertiliser below or to the side of the seed in the seeding slot
eligible.eligibleBullet07: drill through an established growing cover crop of at least 15cm
eligible.eligibleBullet08: have separate seed and fertiliser hoppers
eligible.eligibleBullet10: drill the full range of arable and cover crops including cereals

notEligible.notEligibleBullet01: drills with cultivation or seed bed preparation equipment in front of the seeding slot, unless this is part of the fertiliser placement equipment
notEligible.notEligibleBullet02: drills that broadcast fertiliser on the surface rather than place the fertiliser in the soil below or to the side of the seed
